data.name: Fel Orc
data.description:
Fel Orc

Units:
+12% damage
-4 armor
-5% evasion

Buildings:
+100 attack range
-10% hit points

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Traits: Its more about making your enemies weaker than increasing your own strength. Lots of debilitating effects susceptible to buff dispels. Overfocused on offence and thus lacking in defence.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Hypersense Aura
auras.description:
Reveals entire map
Reveals invisible units
(10000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Unholy Aura
auras.description:
+30% unit move speed
(4500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Repulse Aura
auras.description:
45 damage return shield
+4 base armor
(affects your buildings only)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Archimonde's Right Hand [Q]
bonuses.description:
Mannoroth replaces Xerox

Special Unit (Melee)
-20% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Ground Slam (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 3-9 sec stun
(300-600 area of effect)
Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
14-20% area damage
Corruption Aura (Disable Aura)
6-12 armor reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Rain of Chaos (Summoning Spell)
summons 3 Infernals for 30-60 sec

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Fel Hound [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Demon Blood

Chosen barracks will spawn +2 units
(can capture neutral buildings)
Abilities:
Feedback (Orb Effect)
(burns 40 mana per hit)
(burns half amount to Heroes)
(does not affect Special unit)
Berserk (Self Spell)
(+50% AS for 7 sec)
(deals 75 damage per cast)
Upgrades used:
Dimensional Portal
Fel Steel Armor
Demon Blood

Type: Single Lane Focus

bonuses.name: Lost Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Lost Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description:

(does not affect Special unit)

spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

spells.description:

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Blades
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's armor
Affects: Slasher
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: -3 armor for 4 sec
Lv2: -6 armor for 6 sec
Lv3: -9 armor for 8 sec
Lv4: -12 armor for 10 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Sap
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: slows units in 175 AoE
Affects: Ogre Magi
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 10% slow for 15 sec
Lv2: 20% slow for 15 sec
Lv3: 30% slow for 15 sec
Lv4: 40% slow for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Fire Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage over time
Affects: Crossbowman
(affects buildings only)

Lv1: 4 damage/sec for 45 sec
Lv2: 8 damage/sec for 45 sec
Lv3: 12 damage/sec for 45 sec
Lv4: 16 damage/sec for 45 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Multishot
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: multishot for speed penalty
Affects: Crossbowman

Lv1: 3 targets, -30% attack rate
Lv2: 3 targets, -20% attack rate
Lv3: 3 targets, -10% attack rate
Lv4: 3 targets, no penalty

towerUpgrades.name: Chaotic Swings
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: splash damage in 175 AoE
Affects: Hound Mistress

Lv1: 10% to do 30 damage
Lv2: 20% to do 40 damage
Lv3: 30% to do 50 damage
Lv4: 40% to do 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Bloodlust
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to increase attack rate
Affects: Ogre Magi
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +5% attack rate
Lv2: +10% attack rate
Lv3: +15% attack rate
Lv4: +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: spell shield ability
Affects: Ogre Magi
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: blocks 50 spell damage
Lv2: blocks 100 spell damage
Lv3: blocks 150 spell damage
Lv4: blocks 200 spell damage

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Fire
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage over time in 150 AoE
Affects: Gan'arg Cannon and Burrow
(deals 50% damage to buildings)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 3 sec
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 3 sec
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 3 sec
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 3 sec

spells.name: Fel Fire (Lv1)
spells.description: 6 damage/sec for 3 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Demon Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: regeneration and attack rate
Affects: All non-Hero units
(affects organic units only)
(affects summoned Infernals)

Lv1: +3 HP/sec, +4% attack rate
Lv2: +6 HP/sec, +8% attack rate
Lv3: +9 HP/sec, +12% attack rate
Lv4: +12 HP/sec, +16% attack rate

+12% damage

-10% hit points

+10% research speed

Traits: Its more about making your enemies weaker than increasing your own strength. Lots of debilitating effects susceptible to buff dispels. Overfocused on offence and thus lacking in defence.
